title: 一个错误
author: 穿拖鞋的男孩
txt_content:
我装了UgoCraft之后出现了：
16 mods loaded
Minecraft Forge 3.2.4.114
FML v2.1.28.95
Forge Mod Loader version 2.1.28.95 for Minecraft 1.2.5
 mod_ModLoaderMp : Initialized (minecraft.jar)
 mod_MinecraftForge : Initialized (minecraft.jar)
 mod_Speedblock : Initialized (minecraft.jar)
 mod_TooManyItems : Initialized (minecraft.jar)
 mod_Arrows : Initialized (minecraft.jar)
 mod_Guns : Initialized (minecraft.jar)
 mod_DimensionAPI : Initialized (minecraft.jar)
 mod_SpaceCraft : Initialized (minecraft.jar)
 mod_ClayMan : Initialized (1.25粘土人汉化.zip)
 mod_ReiMinimap : Initialized ([1.2.5]ReiMinimap_v3.1.zip)
 mod_Decoratives : Initialized (Decoratives_Mod_1.4.2.zip)
 mod_Zeppelin : Initialized (mod_Zeppelin-client-1.2.5.0.31.zip)
 mod_AnimalBikes : Initialized (modloader_animalbikes_1.2.5_v2.zip)
 mod_StuffedAnimals : Initialized (Stuffed Animals.zip)
 mod_UgoCraft : Pre-initialized (UgoCraft_Client_1.2.5_HS_20120623_01.zip)
 Balkon's WeaponMod : Pre-initialized (WeaponMod.zip)

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.


--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 209b7202 --------
Generated 12-6-29 下午6:54
Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.5
OS: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
Java: 1.6.0_32, Sun Microsystems Inc.
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Sun Microsystems Inc.
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: GeForce GT 430/PCI/SSE2 version 4.1.0, NVIDIA Corporation
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Slot 170 is already occupied by IanTableBlock@1f2f70a when adding maocat.UgoCraft.BlockMarker@38d460
 at pb.<init>(Block.java:249)
 at agy.<init>(BlockContainer.java:7)
 at maocat.UgoCraft.BlockMarker.<init>(BlockMarker.java:18)
 at mod_UgoCraft.load(mod_UgoCraft.java:224)
 at cpw.mods.fml.common.modloader.ModLoaderModContainer.init(ModLoaderModContainer.java:319)
 at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.modInit(Loader.java:259)
 at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.initializeMods(Loader.java:589)
 at cpw.mods.fml.client.FMLClientHandler.onLoadComplete(FMLClientHandler.java:194)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(Minecraft.java:426)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:735)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT 74daa60e ----------
求解决

replies.author: 穿拖鞋的男孩
replies.txt_content:
yuxuanchiadm 发表于 2012-6-29 18:51 
物品ID冲突，自行修改
怎样修改？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？、、、

replies.author: yuxuanchiadm
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 yuxuanchiadm 于 2012-6-29 19:21 编辑 

.minecraft\config\mod_UgoCraft.cfg里修改

具体怎么修改参考：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=28312&page=1#pid387596
